column4: hello, i work with FTP a lot, but i dont want to save the login data on every client computer i have, is there any way for me to save that stuff on my ubuntu server and somehow auto-connect to my ftp servers through that?
or mount ftp/sftp directories in my users home folder?
first off, ditch FTP and use SFTP
the real problem with FTP is that it requires both the server *and* the client to allow arbitrary users to write to anywhere in the filesystem
